import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect'; import './checkout.styles.scss'; import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/car.selectors' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' function handleClick() { console.log("test"); } const CheckoutPage = ({ cartItems, totalPrice }) => { return
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(item => ) }
TOTAL: ${totalPrice}
*Please use the following test credit card for payments*
4242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: 10/20 - CVV: 123
} const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems: selectCartItems, totalPrice: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
